author: adityapatwardhan
body:
Add tests for *-Item cmdlets. Missing areas are: 

- [x] Literal paths
- [x] Error cases
- [ ] AccessDenied Error
- [ ] SessionStateItem and SessionStateContainer error cases
- [x] Dynamic parameters
- [x] *-Item for alternate streams
- [x] Get-ChildItem for file
- [x] Rename-Item for directory
- [x] Copy-Item over remote session
- [x] *-Item for Registry provider
- [x] *-Item for Function provider
- [ ] Mapped network drive

comments.author: jeffbi
adityapatwardhan
comments.body:
@jeffbi We are interested covering the missing code paths at: https://codecov.io/gh/PowerShell/PowerShell/src/master/src/System.Management.Automation/namespaces/FileSystemProvider.cs

The list above is a summary of what is missing. So some tests might not look very useful, but there is untested code that exists and hence we need to exercise those code paths.

@kalgiz I recommend looking at the function provider first.  Work with @adityapatwardhan  to figure out what tests are needed.
After that, you could work on the remoting tests.  @PaulHigin  would be a good resource for showing you how to use remoting in a test.
